physical_appearance: "The image displays a brochure. It is grey in colour with black and yellow lines. ""Doris Geddes Raffles Hotel"" is stated at the top of the brochure. There is a motif of flowers decorating the brochure. The top end of the brochure is convex while the other three ends are straight. There is a thick black vertical line running down the middle of the brochure
title_text: Doris Geddes Little Shop in Raffles Hotel Singapore Items Related to Doris Geddes
subject_terms_1: with door handles on either side at one point advertisements retail stores flower (motif)
subject_terms_2: to resemble a door that can be pulled outwards to go through." Raffles Hotel advertising Stores, Retail Motifs
